issue.title: allwebsites.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://allwebsites.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fallwebsites.com) ### Comment > Assistant settings doesn't work in Chrome. The window cuts off the save button at the bottom and won't let me scroll or zoom to save the settings. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/esj2kn6jai0ocwsk8gwskwwwc84gckg14f5jlve1uy.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.2.1984 release System version: | `MacOS 15.5 (Build 24F74)` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `AdGuard DNS filter` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Language-specific:
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `none` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&channel=release&custom_filters=&dns.bootstraps=&dns.custom_filters=&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_enabled=false&dns.fallbacks=&dns.filters=1&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&dns.timeout=2000&extensions=AdGuard+Assistant+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fassistant%2F4.3%2Fassistant.user.js%29%2CAdGuard+Popup+Blocker+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CAdGuard+Extra+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4.17.249&product_type=Mac&product_version=2.17.2.1984+release&referrer=&scheme_version=3&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=MacOS+15.5+%28Build+24F74%29&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Macintosh%3B+Intel+Mac+OS+X+10_15_7%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F138.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36)
